It features an all-star cast including Viola Davis, Octavia Spencer, and Emma Stone, who deliver powerful performances that will leave you moved.

Another intriguing option is "The Other Boleyn Girl" (2008), a period drama set in Tudor England about two sisters vying for the affection of King Henry VIII.
